AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: scallop farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned a small scallop farm back on Pyandonea. Admittedly the scallop were incredibly easy to look after, and [PAWN_nameDef] actually spent most days cooking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: fire salts cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't exactly the best cook out there, [PAWN_pronoun] did know how to cook using fire salts, and this made [PAWN_objective] invaluable on long voyages.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: fisher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While [PAWN_nameDef] worked a tiring job during the day, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed relaxing near the coast, and fishing for a while. Admittedly this wasn't actually that relaxing, as there was always the chance that a sea serpent lurking was lurking in the kelp.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: wasten coraldale mudcrab chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] earnt quite a living cooking wasten coraldale mudcrab. [PAWN_possessive] dishes were considered some of the finest on Pyandonea, which [PAWN_nameDef] could most certainly attest to.
